title: New: Soft Lighting – On Nibiru
content:
With this, his fourth track, Bryan Cox aka Soft Lighting tries something rather different.

His previous three efforts to date were quite atypical synth-pop inspired numbers, verging on the dreaded chillwave word, so it’s interesting to hear him take up an entirely instrumental approach on On Nibiru. It’s a twisting behemoth of a track, spinning wildly between clunky bass sounds and the disorientating synths, leaving the listener utterly perplexed yet enthralled. Check out On Nibiru below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
